span.div: All schools will be closed until further notice.

li.a: Mr. Thomas' Letter to Madison Community, Staff and Board - 03/27/2020

span.div: Parents and Guardians, please submit the form below to let our Food Service Department know you would like meals, and where you will pickup.

strong.span: ** THERE WILL NO LONGER BE MEAL DELIVERY, ONLY PICKUP AT LOCATIONS LISTED BELO

span.div: Middle School pickup time will be 10am-noon
Madison South pickup time will be noon-2pm
Trinity United Methodist Church, 1592 Grace Street between 5:00pm and 6:30pm, if unable to pickup at middle school or Madison South

li.a: Mr. Gordon's Intro to Google Classroom
Ages of Learning - ABCMouse / Adventure Academy / ReadingIQ

span.div: All Madison Schools will be closed starting Tuesday, March 17, 2020 through Monday, April 13, 2020 until further notice.
The Madison Early Childhood Learning Center is closed, and will remain closed until further notice. Updates will be posted on the website.

ul.li: All extra-curricular activities, sports and practices are cancelled

li.a: How to Support Your Child’s Health and Well-Being During Ohio’s Ordered School-Building Closure

span.p: This is a quickly evolving situation that changes every day. The most up to date information can be found online here - CDC COVID-19 Information
